Articles.Content:
Hello.

I can´t load my saved game.

The Program says:

Game Persistence Error: No Roster node found in save state: ASP Career.

Can someone help me?
Can you upload the save somewhere and provide a link?

Sorry, no i can`t.

I don`t know how i can get the save and where to upload.

Google Drive is what I use to upload stuff like that.

The autosave file is:

Kerbal Space Program/game/saves/<name of save>/persistent.sfs

Where the Kerbal Space Program folder is depends on your OS, what version of the game you have (i.e. GoG, Steam, Store install), and if you told it to install anywhere else.

What version of the game do you have?

Thank you very much for the Info`s. It helps.

Ich renamed another  .sfs and loadmeta file in Persistent - it goes.

Thanks UHU
